title: League of legends wont open
body: HI My league client wont open when i click the launcher it shows up for about a second but then it goes away and it doesnt start league and there is nothing on the task manager

replies.body:
Since the launcher never loads but you do see the logo on the screen for a split second, it sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher. If your OS doesn't have certain permissions in place, it may think a program is harmful and stop it from running. Take a look at our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see how you can set up those permissions.

Let me know if you have any questions.
